description: Overnight stay in Berlin to top prices in top pension / guesthouse! Exclusive Apartments and lofts really in the middle of scene district Prenzlauer Berg, Alexanderplatz near. Ideally for short trip to cultivation and sport events in the german capital.
name: 1A Apartment Guesthouse and Hotel

reviews.text: Not in a touristy area, this is a good location for folks who want to stay in "East Berlin" and still have good access to the train for sightseeing.
reviews.title: Felt like a local. Would stay again.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The person who showed me the room was friendly, but then I never saw anyone again. This is fine if you're not looking for a lot of attention, but would be an issue if you want to stay in a place that has front desk staff - there's no front desk here.
reviews.title: big disappointment

reviews.text: My room was really small, as was the bathroom - but both were tidy and everything well-maintained. My room was on the "inside" of the building, looking out onto a courtyard. Avoid a street-side room, especially on the first floor, which didn't look like it got a whole lot of privacy.
reviews.title: Nice little place

likes.liked: — Great accommodation at a great price

reviews.text: There are several food options nearby and a great little shop a few yards away that had everything I needed (water, snacks). I felt totally safe walking around alone at night and the proximity to the train is great. The wireless internet was excellent.
reviews.title: My favorite place to stay in Berlin!

likes.disliked: — I find no faults with this Pension
likes.liked: — It was clean and quiet and the staff was friendly and efficient

reviews.text: All-in-all I can recommend this as an option over staying at a hostel. But it's not really a "hotel" - it's really like staying in an apartment building. It worked for me and I'd have no problem staying again.
reviews.title: Great Bargain and Location

reviews.text: I was over in Berlin with my wife to catch a glimpse of the Berlin film festival, and as we had predicted we wouldn't have that much time to idle around in a hotel, we opted for budget accommodation like this. I usually dread staying in such places, as my idea of staying in a near-filthy room isn't exactly appealing. But how wrong I had been.
reviews.title: Excellent Choice!

reviews.text: This accommodation indeed turned out to be an excellent punt in all respects. Importantly, despite not being exactly within walking distance of the centre (took about 10 minutes by taxi to get back from Alexander Platz at 2am) it is superbly located only around 200m from the U2 underground line, meaning getting to the more central areas is a matter of less than 10 minutes. The area is extremely quiet, there is a supermarket (Kaiser's) located just opposite the flat, a 24-hour amenity store run by what seemed like a Turkish family 1-minute away down the road, and a big shopping mall (Schönhauser Allee Arcaden), cinema (Colosseum) and plenty of take-aways in the main road (Schönhauser Allee) nearby. Room was extremely clean and the owners certainly have good tastes in decor. As some reviewers have ponted out here and elsewhere, the only downside is that it lacks proper reception, but who needs it after all? I'd certainly go back there next year.
reviews.title: Perfect place in Prenzlauer Berg

likes.liked: — The cleanliness and the spaciousness of the rooms.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We only stayed for a night but loved the apartment. Rooms were big, clean and very centrally located in the middle of hip and trendy Prenzlauer Berg.
reviews.title: Nice Apartment

reviews.text: I stayed in Apartment 1a for 3 nights December '07. It's in a good location in Prenzlauer Berg which has many bars/restaurants, and also there is a 24hr supermarket literally 2 minutes down the road. Which was handy! Its about a five-ten minute walk to the nearest u-bahn. There is no reception, but you can contact the owner if needs be, and he proved to be really nice and helpful.
reviews.title: 1A Apartment & Pension in Berlin

reviews.text: There is a coffee/tea vending machine in the entrance area and free internet, which was always available when I wanted to use the PC.
reviews.title: Lovely guesthouse !
